The Traveling Programmer

  • Home

My name is Helene. Welcome to my corner in the internet where I share my life. I dont know how you found me, but I'm glad you did. I post about traveling and programminig and life in general so, stick around for a new adventure I plan on taking in my life. You never know what might happen next.
